p: As shown in Table 3, antifungal activity was not observed against Candida spp., Cryptococcus neoformans and Microsporum canis. A weak action against Trichophyton mentagrophytes was found, and Paracoccidioides brasiliensis demonstrated a moderate degree of sensitivity to the essential oil based on the minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) classification adopted by Holetz et al. (2002) [ 44].
